Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory187.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Student Vendor', 3: 'Cotton candy, fluffy crepes, silky creme brulee—', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Student Vendor', 3: "All your favorite snacks, we've got them! Come and take a look!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'You enter the festival and notice that the entire Education District looks different. The streets are decorated like school festivals of the Golden Age, vibrant and bustling.'}
{3: "The sidewalks are packed with students and their stalls, along with parents who've taken time off work to attend their child's graduation ceremony."}
{3: 'You look carefully and see many familiar faces from various departments in the crowd. This festival is indeed quite popular.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Student Vendor', 3: 'Cotton candy! Fluffy and yummy cotton candy! Come get your cotton candy!', 4: '1'}
{3: "Barely two steps in and you're drowning in vendors' calls."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: "Oh, it's cotton candy!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "It brings back memories... I haven't had this in years.", 4: '1'}
{3: "There's a hint of nostalgia in her voice. Bridget suddenly turns to look at you."}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: '【kuroname】, have you ever had cotton candy?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Since we're here, let's get some! Sweets will lift your spirits, and we're gonna have a good day!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Then you definitely have to try it!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "I'll take one.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Student Vendor', 3: 'Thank you for your purchase!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Just one?'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "I'm a Construct... I don't really need to eat.", 4: '1'}
{3: "That is such a lame excuse, and Bridget's unnatural tone is giving her away."}
{2: "That won't do.", 3: '32'}
{2: 'Please give us another one.', 3: '33'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Student Vendor', 3: 'Coming right up!', 4: '1'}
{2: "This isn't the Bridget I know at all.", 3: '40'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Well, thank you!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The student skillfully packs up two balls of cotton candy.'}
{3: "This fluffy candy looks like a toy, smells sweet, and is only found at festivals. The moment you grab it, you're in a festive mood."}
{1: '1', 3: 'Bridget carefully takes a tiny bite of her cotton candy.'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Mm... It tastes just like I remember.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "When I was little, I got one of this, and I didn't want to finish it too quickly, so I nibbled on it as I walked around town all afternoon, and...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "I didn't even notice when all the fluff had melted away.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "That's when I regretted not eating it faster.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Bridget tells embarrassing stories from her childhood as you take small bites out of the white, sugary fluff.'}
{3: 'The fine sugary strands melt in her mouth, filling it with blissful delight.'}
{3: 'This is the pure taste of 100% sugar—a caloric explosion without any embellishments.'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Haha, I knew you weren't used to something this sweet!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Haha, who would've thought the Gray Raven Commandant had such childlike tastes!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'But eating too much cotton candy will make you thirsty.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Wait here for a bit, I'll go get you some water...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Her smile suddenly freezes after turning around.'}
{2: "What's wrong?", 3: '70', 4: '(Take a bite of your cotton candy)', 5: '70'}
{3: 'She inches back toward you in stiff movements and whispers something to you.'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Right there, three of my squad members.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'By the ice cream stand—it\'s "High Wall", ""Sand Fox"", and "Lizard".', 4: '1'}
{2: 'What should we do?', 3: '77', 4: '(Take another bite)', 5: '77'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Hold this position, pretend you're eating, cover your face, and fall back towards your 8 o'clock.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Got it.', 3: '79', 4: 'What about my drink?', 5: '80', 6: "I don't have to pretend, I AM eating.", 7: '81'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Hold on a bit longer! I'll buy you as many drinks as you want once we're safe!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Now follow my order: start with your right foot and proceed toward the fountain.', 4: '1'}
{2: '...I know how to walk.', 3: '86', 4: '(Walk while eating)', 5: '86'}
{3: 'But as fate would have it, you are quickly noticed by the very people you are trying to avoid.'}
{1: '1', 2: '"High Wall"', 3: "Ah! Gray Raven Commandant! You're here for the festival, too?", 4: '1'}
{3: '"High Wall" lives up to his name, towering in height with a booming voice to match.'}
{3: "There's no pretending you didn't notice them at this point."}
{3: '"High Wall" comes charging over with an ice cream in one hand and a small flag in the other. The flag says "sweet" on it.'}
{3: 'From the corner of your eye, you see Bridget quickly zipping behind you with her back toward them.'}
{2: '"High Wall"', 3: 'Is that... cotton candy?!', 4: '1'}
{2: '"High Wall"', 3: 'Could you tell me where you got that from?', 4: '1'}
{2: '"High Wall"', 3: "Thanks! Who would've thought the Gray Raven Commandant likes sweets...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Before "High Wall" can finish speaking, "Sand Fox" cuts them off.'}
{2: '"Sand Fox"', 3: "Hey, that's so rude! Don't go labeling people like that. Besides, maybe 【kuroname】 is on Team Salty!", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Next to "High Wall" is "Sand Fox", who is holding some fries with salt in one hand and waving a small flag in the other. The flag says "salt".'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lizard', 3: "Look who's talking. Most people eat both sweet and salty stuff. You two are both extremists.", 4: '1'}
{3: '"Lizard" proceeds to take a bite of the hot dog they\'re holding—after dipping it in the ice cream in their other hand.'}
{1: '1', 3: '"High Wall" and "Sand Fox" take a clear step back, their faces twisting in disgust.'}
{2: '"High Wall" & "Sand Fox"', 3: "Most people don't eat hot dogs like that, either!", 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{2: 'Glad to see you all get along so well.', 3: '117', 4: '(Take another bite of cotton candy)', 5: '121'}
{2: '"High Wall" & "Sand Fox"', 3: "No, we don't!", 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lizard', 3: 'You two definitely get along great.', 4: '1'}
{3: "You can tell that Bridget's body tensed up for a moment without looking back."}
{2: '"High Wall"', 3: "【kuroname】, that person behind you, isn't that...", 4: '1'}
{3: '"Sand Fox" is faster and immediately covers "High Wall\'s" mouth.'}
{3: 'You notice beads of cold sweat on "Sand Fox\'s" face.'}
{2: '"Sand Fox"', 3: "There's nothing behind 【kuroname】! Nothing at all!", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lizard', 3: 'Hey "High Wall", didn\'t you want some marshmallows? Let\'s hurry and get some.', 4: '3'}
{3: 'The two of them quickly usher "High Wall" away.'}
{3: 'Bridget turns around only after the three have completely disappeared into the crowd.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Oh, great. They definitely recognized me.', 4: '1'}
{2: "I've been wanting to ask you something.", 3: '143'}
{2: 'Why are you trying to hide from your team members?', 3: '144'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "It's because of you, duh.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Some rumors are going around...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'If someone sees us together again, and starts another rumor...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "I don't want people to hear more rumors about you. I'd feel awful if your reputation as a commandant was damaged because of me.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "It's decided! Tomorrow I'll personally put them through some extra training!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Extra training—no question about it!', 4: "Maybe we shouldn't be so harsh..."}
